Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class StartingPhaseSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.StartingPhaseSceneController
public class StartingPhaseSceneController extends Object
A scene controller used for communicating with the scenes of the starting phase

  • Constructor Details

    • StartingPhaseSceneController

      public StartingPhaseSceneController()
      Creates an instance and links it to the SceneProxy. Initialize the list for the starting leaders choice.

  • Method Details

    • loadLeaderCards

      public void loadLeaderCards​(List<String> leaders)
      sets the images of the starting hand leaders.
      Parameters:
      leaders - the list of leaders extracted by the server.

    • cardSelection

      public void cardSelection​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Adds the clicked leader (EventObject.getSource()) to the list of chosen leaders and puts a glow effect on the image. If there are already two leaders in the list removes the oldest choice.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the click on the card.

    • sendLeaders

      public void sendLeaders()
      Checks if the number of chosen leaders is 2 and if it is sends a new message (LeadersChoiceMessage. If the size of the list is not 2 prints an error message.

    • loadStartingResources

      public void loadStartingResources​(int numResources)
      Sets the text on startingResourcesLabel based on the number of resource that the player has to choose.
      Parameters:
      numResources - the number of resource that the player has to choose.

    • addCoin

      public void addCoin()
      Adds a coin to the list of chosen resources and increases the count on the relative text.

    • addServant

      public void addServant()
      Adds a servant to the list of chosen resources and increases the count on the relative text.

    • addShield

      public void addShield()
      Adds a shield to the list of chosen resources and increases the count on the relative text.

    • addStone

      public void addStone()
      Adds a coin to the list of chosen resources and increases the count on the relative text.

    • chooseResources

      public void chooseResources()
      Checks if the size of the list of chosen resources is equals to the number of resources to be chosen and if it's not launch a pop up with a warning message. If the numbers are equals than populates the market buffer and loads the gameScene.

    • leadersChoiceError

      public void leadersChoiceError​(String errorMessage)
      Launch a pop up with a warning message and reset the scene.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - the error message to be printed.
